<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

Refreshes the caldav calendar with the id specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"calendarId":{"description":"Calendar ID","type":"string"},"team":{"description":"User list","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
